title: Bougainville: Will it become the world's next country?
content: Bougainville could be about to vote for independence. But where is it? And why is there a referendum?

title: Impeachment inquiry: Trump directed Ukraine pressure - Sondland
content: Ambassador Gordon Sondland tells the impeachment inquiry he followed the president's orders.

title: Sydney smoke: Australia fires send haze over Sydney and Adelaide
content: Millions of residents in the Australian cities have woken to warnings of poor and hazardous air quality.

title: The garlic farmers who love Trump's tariffs
content: American garlic farmers say demand is rising after the US president put tariffs on Chinese imports.

title: A third of tropical African plants face extinction
content: An assessment shows rapid loss of trees, shrubs and herbs in countries such as Ethiopia and Tanzania.

title: Why Seychelles has world's worst heroin problem
content: The Indian Ocean archipelago suffers from the highest rate of heroin abuse in the world, but policy makers are hopeful that rehabilitation will curb addiction.

title: Syria conflict: Who benefits from its oil?
content: The US is at the centre of an international row over claims to a slice of Syria's oil revenues.

title: Bolivia crisis: New elections proposed as violence rages
content: Interim leader Jeanine Áñez asks Congress to approve new elections as violence engulfs the country.

title: Russian domestic violence: Women fight back
content: Two years ago Russia passed a law reducing sentences for domestic violence. There is now a movement pushing back.

title: Brown bear attacks: Deaths spark fear in Romania
content: Three men die in little over a month in Romania, home to Europe's biggest brown bear population.
